verses.verse: וַיַּגֵּ֤ד <S%H5046><s%> told אַחְאָב֙ <S%H256><s%> And Ahab לְאִיזֶ֔בֶל <S%H348><s%> Jezebel אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> and how עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> had done אֵלִיָּ֑הוּ <S%H452><s%> all that Elijah וְאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> and how הָרַ֛ג <S%H2026><s%> and withal how he had slain אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַנְּבִיאִ֖ים <S%H5030><s%> all the prophets בֶּחָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> with the sword

וַתִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> sent אִיזֶ֙בֶל֙ <S%H348><s%> Then Jezebel מַלְאָ֔ךְ <S%H4397><s%> a messenger אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֵלִיָּ֖הוּ <S%H452><s%> unto Elijah לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> So יַעֲשׂ֤וּן <S%H6213><s%> do אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> So let the gods וְכֹ֣ה <S%H3541><s%> and even יוֹסִפ֔וּן <S%H3254><s%> [to me] and more כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> if כָעֵ֤ת <S%H6256><s%> about this time מָחָר֙ <S%H4279><s%> of them by to morrow אָשִׂ֣ים <S%H7760><s%> also if I make אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשְׁךָ֔ <S%H5315><s%> not thy life כְּנֶ֖פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> as the life אַחַ֥ד <S%H259><s%> of one מֵהֶֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> like

וַיַּ֗רְא <S%H7200><s%> And when he saw וַיָּ֙קָם֙ <S%H6965><s%> [that] he arose וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and ran אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about נַפְשׁ֔וֹ <S%H5315><s%> for his life וַיָּבֹ֕א <S%H935><s%> and came בְּאֵ֥ר שֶׁ֖בַע <S%H884><s%> to Beersheba אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which לִֽיהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> which [belongeth] to Judah וַיַּנַּ֥ח <S%H3240><s%> and left אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> נַעֲר֖וֹ <S%H5288><s%> his servant שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וְהֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> himself הָלַ֤ךְ <S%H1980><s%> But he himself went בַּמִּדְבָּר֙ <S%H4057><s%> into the wilderness דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> journey י֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> a day's וַיָּבֹ֕א <S%H935><s%> and came וַיֵּ֕שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> and sat down תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> under רֹ֣תֶם <S%H7574><s%> juniper tree [אֶחָת כ] (אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> a ק) וַיִּשְׁאַ֤ל <S%H7592><s%> and he requested אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשׁוֹ֙ <S%H5315><s%> for himself לָמ֔וּת <S%H4191><s%> that he might die וַיֹּ֣אמֶר ׀ <S%H559><s%> and said רַ֗ב <S%H7227><s%> It is enough עַתָּ֤ה <S%H6258><s%> now יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> now O LORD קַ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> take away נַפְשִׁ֔י <S%H5315><s%> my life כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> I am not ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> for I [am] not better אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> my מֵאֲבֹתָֽי׃ <S%H1><s%> than my fathers

וַיִּשְׁכַּב֙ <S%H7901><s%> And as he lay וַיִּישַׁ֔ן <S%H3462><s%> and slept תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> under רֹ֣תֶם <S%H7574><s%> juniper tree אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> under a וְהִנֵּֽה־ <S%H2009><s%> and behold זֶ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> there מַלְאָךְ֙ <S%H4397><s%> behold then an angel נֹגֵ֣עַ <S%H5060><s%> touched בּ֔וֹ וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> him and said ל֖וֹ ק֥וּם <S%H6965><s%> unto him Arise אֱכֽוֹל׃ <S%H398><s%> [and] eat

וַיַּבֵּ֕ט <S%H5027><s%> And he looked וְהִנֵּ֧ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold מְרַאֲשֹׁתָ֛יו <S%H4763><s%> at his head עֻגַ֥ת <S%H5692><s%> and behold [there was] a cake רְצָפִ֖ים <S%H7529><s%> baken on the coals וְצַפַּ֣חַת <S%H6835><s%> and a cruse מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> of water וַיֹּ֣אכַל <S%H398><s%> And he did eat וַיֵּ֔שְׁתְּ <S%H8354><s%> and drink וַיָּ֖שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> again וַיִּשְׁכָּֽב׃ <S%H7901><s%> and laid him down

וַיָּשָׁב֩ <S%H7725><s%> came again מַלְאַ֨ךְ <S%H4397><s%> And the angel יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD שֵׁנִית֙ <S%H8145><s%> the second time וַיִּגַּע־ <S%H5060><s%> and touched בּ֔וֹ וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> him and said ק֣וּם <S%H6965><s%> Arise אֱכֹ֑ל <S%H398><s%> [and] eat כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> because רַ֥ב <S%H7227><s%> [is] too great מִמְּךָ֖ <S%H4480><s%> is too הַדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <S%H1870><s%> because the journey

וַיָּ֖קָם <S%H6965><s%> And he arose וַיֹּ֣אכַל <S%H398><s%> and did eat וַיִּשְׁתֶּ֑ה <S%H8354><s%> and drink וַיֵּ֜לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went בְּכֹ֣חַ ׀ <S%H3581><s%> in the strength הָאֲכִילָ֣ה <S%H396><s%> of that meat הַהִ֗יא <S%H1931><s%> he אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> forty יוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> days וְאַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> and forty לַ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> nights עַ֛ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> the mount הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God חֹרֵֽב׃ <S%H2722><s%> unto Horeb

וַיָּבֹא־ <S%H935><s%> And he came שָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> there אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמְּעָרָ֖ה <S%H4631><s%> thither unto a cave וַיָּ֣לֶן <S%H3885><s%> and lodged שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> there וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> there and behold the word יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> [came] to him and he said ל֔וֹ מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What לְּךָ֥ פֹ֖ה <S%H6311><s%> here אֵלִיָּֽהוּ׃ <S%H452><s%> Elijah

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> And he said קַנֹּ֨א <S%H7065><s%> I have been very קִנֵּ֜אתִי <S%H7065><s%> jealous לַיהוָ֣ה ׀ <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God צְבָא֗וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עָזְב֤וּ <S%H5800><s%> have forsaken בְרִֽיתְךָ֙ <S%H1285><s%> thy covenant בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> for the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִזְבְּחֹתֶ֣יךָ <S%H4196><s%> thine altars הָרָ֔סוּ <S%H2040><s%> thrown down וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נְבִיאֶ֖יךָ <S%H5030><s%> thy prophets הָרְג֣וּ <S%H2026><s%> and slain בֶחָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> with the sword וָֽאִוָּתֵ֤ר <S%H3498><s%> and I [even] I only am left אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> and I לְבַדִּ֔י <S%H905><s%> alone וַיְבַקְשׁ֥וּ <S%H1245><s%> and they seek אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשִׁ֖י <S%H5315><s%> my life לְקַחְתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3947><s%> to take it away

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said צֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> Go forth וְעָמַדְתָּ֣ <S%H5975><s%> and stand בָהָר֮ <S%H2022><s%> upon the mount לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָה֒ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְהִנֵּ֧ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> And behold the LORD עֹבֵ֗ר <S%H5674><s%> passed by וְר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> wind גְּדוֹלָ֡ה <S%H1419><s%> and a great וְחָזָ֞ק <S%H2389><s%> and strong מְפָרֵק֩ <S%H6561><s%> rent הָרִ֨ים <S%H2022><s%> the mountains וּמְשַׁבֵּ֤ר <S%H7665><s%> and brake in pieces סְלָעִים֙ <S%H5553><s%> the rocks לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not בָר֖וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> [was] not in the wind יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> [but] the LORD וְאַחַ֤ר <S%H310><s%> and after הָר֨וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> the wind רַ֔עַשׁ <S%H7494><s%> an earthquake לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not בָרַ֖עַשׁ <S%H7494><s%> [was] not in the earthquake יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> [but] the LORD

וְאַחַ֤ר <S%H310><s%> And after הָרַ֙עַשׁ֙ <S%H7494><s%> the earthquake אֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> a fire לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not בָאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> [was] not in the fire יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> [but] the LORD וְאַחַ֣ר <S%H310><s%> and after הָאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> the fire ק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> voice דְּמָמָ֥ה <S%H1827><s%> a still דַקָּֽה׃ <S%H1851><s%> small

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> become כִּשְׁמֹ֣עַ <S%H8085><s%> heard אֵלִיָּ֗הוּ <S%H452><s%> And it was [so] when Elijah וַיָּ֤לֶט <S%H3874><s%> [it] that he wrapped פָּנָיו֙ <S%H6440><s%> his face בְּאַדַּרְתּ֔וֹ <S%H155><s%> in his mantle וַיֵּצֵ֕א <S%H3318><s%> and went out וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> and stood פֶּ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> in the entering in הַמְּעָרָ֑ה <S%H4631><s%> of the cave וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> about ק֔וֹל <S%H6963><s%> And behold [there came] a voice וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> unto him and said מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What לְּךָ֥ פֹ֖ה <S%H6311><s%> here אֵלִיָּֽהוּ׃ <S%H452><s%> Elijah

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> And he said קַנֹּ֨א <S%H7065><s%> I have been very קִנֵּ֜אתִי <S%H7065><s%> jealous לַיהוָ֣ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God צְבָא֗וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עָזְב֤וּ <S%H5800><s%> have forsaken בְרִֽיתְךָ֙ <S%H1285><s%> thy covenant בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> because the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִזְבְּחֹתֶ֣יךָ <S%H4196><s%> thine altars הָרָ֔סוּ <S%H2040><s%> thrown down וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נְבִיאֶ֖יךָ <S%H5030><s%> thy prophets הָרְג֣וּ <S%H2026><s%> and slain בֶחָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> with the sword וָאִוָּתֵ֤ר <S%H3498><s%> and I [even] I only am left אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> and I לְבַדִּ֔י <S%H905><s%> alone וַיְבַקְשׁ֥וּ <S%H1245><s%> and they seek אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשִׁ֖י <S%H5315><s%> my life לְקַחְתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3947><s%> to take it away ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to him לֵ֛ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go שׁ֥וּב <S%H7725><s%> return לְדַרְכְּךָ֖ <S%H1870><s%> on thy way מִדְבַּ֣רָה <S%H4057><s%> to the wilderness דַמָּ֑שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> of Damascus וּבָ֗אתָ <S%H935><s%> and when thou comest וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֧ <S%H4886><s%> anoint אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲזָאֵ֛ל <S%H2371><s%> Hazael לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> [to be] king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over אֲרָֽם׃ <S%H758><s%> over Syria

וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> יֵה֣וּא <S%H3058><s%> And Jehu בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נִמְשִׁ֔י <S%H5250><s%> of Nimshi תִּמְשַׁ֥ח <S%H4886><s%> shalt thou anoint לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> [to be] king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> over Israel וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱלִישָׁ֤ע <S%H477><s%> and Elisha בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שָׁפָט֙ <S%H8202><s%> of Shaphat מֵאָבֵ֣ל מְחוֹלָ֔ה <S%H65><s%> of Abelmeholah תִּמְשַׁ֥ח <S%H4886><s%> shalt thou anoint לְנָבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> [to be] prophet תַּחְתֶּֽיךָ׃ <S%H8478><s%> your place
